/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/scenetexture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/scenerendertotex.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/scenemultitex.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/scenealphatest.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/scenereflectcube.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/skybox.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/scenenormalmap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/sceneprojtex.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/scenerefractcube.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter04.dir/scenesamplerobj.cpp.o  -o chapter04 -rdynamic ../ingredients/libingredients.a /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGL -lpthread -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXi -lrt
